General.Name: Mineros SA
General.Description: Mineros S.A. engages in the exploration and production of gold and silver deposits. It principally holds interest in the Nechi Alluvial Property located in Colombia; the Hemco property, as well as the Pioneer and Panama mines located in Nicaragua; the Gualcamayo property in Argentina; and the La Pepa Greenfield project with Yamana located in Chile. The company was formerly known as Mineros de Antioquia S.A. and changed its name to Mineros S.A. in May 2004. Mineros S.A. was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Medellín, Colombia.
